overview: Ding dong... the naughty Babysitters are back, hungry to serve your needs. Mommy's little helpers have dad by the balls, handling the job the horniest way they can. Date night with the wife becomes a shocking, wild orgy at home with the most beautiful girls in the neighborhood, ordered up by none other than gorgeous Jesse Jane. Hot babe BiBi Jones, happily takes on her new job, showing off her nasty sex skills to the man of the house.
tagline: They're back to get a little dirtier this time.
title: Babysitters 2
